data.title: 29 Fun Facts About Demi Lovato
data.meta_description: If you're a fan of the young singer, actress and model Demi Lovato, check out these top fun facts about her and see how many you don't know!
data.text:
If you’re a fan of the young singer, actress, and model Demi Lovato, check out these top fun facts about her and see how many you don’t know!

Her full name is Demetria Devonne Lovato. She is 31 years old and was born on August 20, 1992.

She grew up in Dallas, Texas.

Demi is of Hispanic, Italian, and Irish heritage.

She has an older sister called Dallas and a younger step-sister called Madison.

Demi has a puppy named Bella.

Demi is very talented. Not only can she play the drums, guitar, and piano, but she is also a great vocalist and a songwriter.

According to her Disney bio, she has written over 100 songs.

Demi has performed since the age of 5.

Her first appearance was on Barney and Friends as Angela.

Demi and Selena Gomez have been friends since they met on the cast of the show Barney and Friends when Demi asked Selena to “sit on my jacket and draw crayons with me.” How cute!

Demi and Selena have matching guitar pick necklaces.

She used to have a YouTube show with her friend Selena called “The Demi and Selena Show.”

Demi’s first appearance on the Disney Channel was as Charlotte on As The Bell Rings.

Her favorite song is “Tell me something I don’t know” by Selena Gomez.

She is most well-known for her part in the film Camp Rock as Mitchie Torres.

Her favorite band is Paramore.

Demi loves volleyball and surfing.

When asked in an interview, she said that her role model is Kelly Clarkson.

Demi has a boyfriend called Wilmer and has dated since May 2010.

She wears a purity ring like Selena and the Jonas Brothers.

Demi was home-schooled.

She chose to leave public school due to bullying. She mentioned that a group of people teamed up and signed a petition called “We all hate Demi Lovato.”

She graduated high school in 2009, a year early than expected.

Demi was a vegetarian for a year.

On November 1, 2010, Demi checked herself into a medical clinic to get help with her anorexia and bulimia.

On April 20, 2011, she announced that she has Bi-Polar disorder.

On her left wrist, she has a tattoo saying “Stay,” and on her right, one saying “strong.” She had this done so that whenever she feels like cutting herself, it would be a way of reminding herself to stay strong.

She has a tattoo on her right side saying, “You make me beautiful.”

She was voted #53 in the British FHM “100 Sexiest Women”.
